content: 1 st double_crochet in next 6 sts repeat from * 5 times chain 4 single_crochet in chain 4-space chain 4 join with a slip st 6 groups of 6 sts joined by 12 chain spaces row 9 work a slip st in next st chain 3 double_crochet in next 3 sts *chain 4 single_crochet in chain 4-space chain 4 single_crochet in chain 4-space chain 4 skip 1 st double_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from * 5 times chain 4 single_crochet in chain 4-space chain 4 single_crochet in chain 4-space chain 4 join with a slip st 6 groups of 4 sts joined by 18 chain spaces row 10 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts * chain 4 single_crochet in chain 4-space 3 times chain 4 single_crochet in each of the 2 middle sts repeat from * 5 times chain 4 single_crochet in chain 4-space 3 times chain 4 join with a slip st row 11 work 2 slip sts insert needle into chain 4-space yo and draw through st on needle you are now in the center of a chain 4-space *chain 4 work a single_crochet in chain 4- space repeat from * around 22 more times chain 4 join with a slip st to the base of the original chain 4 fasten_off 24 chain 4 spaces with cc make a slip knot and place on hook row 12 work a slip st to the left side of any single_crochet chain 1 *work 4 single_crochet in the chain 4-space and a single_crochet in the single_crochet repeat from * around the work do not join row 13 work a single_crochet in each single_crochet around join with a slip st and fasten_off finish by working in all ends wet piece and block over an overturned shallow bowl so that it cups slightly it can also be sprayed with some starch or sizing to give it more body sew a comb to the back side with regular thread if desired at approximately 1/3 of the way from the top
